info.title: Customer Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Customer Management specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.description: For filtering: Displayable name

parameters.description: For filtering: Used to tack the lifecycle status, e.g. existing, prospective or former customer

parameters.description: For filtering: A measure of a person's or an organization's creditworthiness calculated on the basis of a combination of factors such as their income and credit history.

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

Customer.description: A person or an organization that buys products and services from the enterprise or receives free offers or services. This is modeled as a party playing the role of customer. A customer is a type of party role.

status.description: Used to tack the lifecycle status, e.g. existing, prospective or former customer

validFor.description: To manage startDate and endDate of customer states

customerRank.description: Relative importance of this customer compared to other customers

Customer_Create.description:
A person or an organization that buys products and services from the enterprise or receives free offers or services. This is modeled as a party playing the role of customer. A customer is a type of party role.
Skipped properties: id,href

status.description: Used to tack the lifecycle status, e.g. existing, prospective or former customer

validFor.description: To manage startDate and endDate of customer states

customerRank.description: Relative importance of this customer compared to other customers

Customer_Update.description:
A person or an organization that buys products and services from the enterprise or receives free offers or services. This is modeled as a party playing the role of customer. A customer is a type of party role.
Skipped properties: id,href,id

status.description: Used to tack the lifecycle status, e.g. existing, prospective or former customer

validFor.description: To manage startDate and endDate of customer states

customerRank.description: Relative importance of this customer compared to other customers

CustomerAccount.description: Is used to represent an account for the customer to manage the billing aspects.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer account

href.description: Unique reference of the customer account

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the customer account

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics.

status.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection.

description.description: Detailed description of the customer account

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

pin.description: A multi digit personal identification number that is used

receivableBalance.description: Overall receivable balance for the customer account

CustomerAccount_Create.description:
Is used to represent an account for the customer to manage the billing aspects.
Skipped properties: id,href

lastModified.description: Date of last modification of the customer account

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics.

status.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection.

description.description: Detailed description of the customer account

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

pin.description: A multi digit personal identification number that is used

receivableBalance.description: Overall receivable balance for the customer account

CustomerAccount_Update.description:
Is used to represent an account for the customer to manage the billing aspects.
Skipped properties: id,href,id,lastModified

accountType.description: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so forth, whose instances share some of the same characteristics.

status.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection.

description.description: Detailed description of the customer account

creditLimit.description: The maximum amount of money that may be charged on an account

pin.description: A multi digit personal identification number that is used

receivableBalance.description: Overall receivable balance for the customer account

PaymentMean.description: Defines a specific mean of payment (e.g. direct debit with all details associated)

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment mean

href.description: Unique reference of the payment mean

validFor.description: Validity period of the payment mean

PaymentMean_Create.description:
Defines a specific mean of payment (e.g. direct debit with all details associated)
Skipped properties: id,href

validFor.description: Validity period of the payment mean

PaymentMean_Update.description:
Defines a specific mean of payment (e.g. direct debit with all details associated)
Skipped properties: id,href,id,href

validFor.description: Validity period of the payment mean

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

CustomerCreditProfile.description: Credit profile for the customer (containing credit scoring, ...). By default only the current credit profile  is retrieved. It can be used as a list to give the customer credit profiles history, the first one in the list will be the current one.

creditProfileDate.description: The date the profile was established

validFor.description: The period for which the profile is valid

creditRiskRating.description: This is an integer whose value is used to rate the risk

creditScore.description: A measure of a person's or an organization's creditworthiness calculated on the basis of a combination of factors such as their income and credit history.

CustomerAccountRef.description: CustomerAccount reference. CustomerAccount is used to represent an account for the customer to manage the billing aspects.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer account

href.description: Unique reference of the customer account

description.description: Detailed description of the customer account

status.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. RelatedParty defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a partyRole reference

validFor.description: Validity period of the related party

Characteristic.description: Describes the characteristics of an individual  or an organization such as individual hobbies, center of interests.

PaymentMeanRef.description: PaymentMean reference. PaymentMean defines a specific mean of payment (e.g direct debit with all details associated).

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment mean

ContactMedium.description: Indicates the contact medium that could be used to contact the customer.

preferred.description: If true, indicates that is the preferred contact medium

type.description: Email address, telephone number, postal address

validFor.description: The time period that the contact medium is valid for

Medium.description: Describes the contact medium that could be used to contact the customer

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format

Contact.description: An individual or an organization used as a contact point for a customer account and accessed via some contact medium.

contactName.description: A displayable name for that contact

partyRoleType.description: Identifies what kind of party role type is linked to the contact (a customer account manager...)

PaymentPlan.description: Defines a plan for payment (when a customer wants to spread his payments)

status.description: Status of the payment plan (effective, ineffective)

numberOfPayments.description: Number of payments used to spread the global payment

validFor.description: Validity period of the payment plan

CustomerAccountBalance.description: Balances linked to the customer account

type.description: Type of the balance : deposit balance, disputed balance, loyalty balance, receivable balance...

CustomerAccountTaxExemption.description: Proof of freedom from taxes imposed by a taxing jurisdiction

issuingJurisdiction.description: Name of the taxing jurisdiction for which taxes are exempt

certificateNumber.description: Identifier of a document that shows proof of exemption from taxes for the taxing jurisdiction

validFor.description: Period for which the exemption is valid

CustomerRef.description: Customer reference. A customer is a person or an organization that buys products or services from the enterprise or receives free offers or services. This is modeled as a party playing the role of customer.

creditCardHolder.description: Name of the credit card holder

BankAccount.description: Describes the information of a bank account

BIC.description: Identifier of the bank according to its international code

domiciliation.description: Address of the bank agency which manages the bank account

IBAN.description: International format to describe a bank account

accountHolder.description: Name of the holder of the bank account

CustomerAccountUpdateNotification.description: The CustomerAccountUpdate notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

CustomerAccountEvent.description: The CustomerAccount event is generated each time a customer account is created, updated, or deleted.

CustomerEvent.description: The Customer event is generated each time a customer has been created, updated, or deleted.

PaymentMeanEvent.description: The PaymentMean event is generated each time a payment mean is created, updated, or deleted.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
